github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Follow the conventional commit message format. Use emojis to indicate the type of change, such as '🎨' for any changes or additions to css files, '✨' for new features, '🐛' for bug fixes, and '📝' for documentation updates. Use multiple emojis for changes to different things. Ensure the message is concise and descriptive and always include a list of key changes.
